title: How long does it take for account recovery ticket to get a response?
body: I would just like to ask how long does it take for an account revoery ticket to get a reponse? I have been waiting for 3 days and stil I have not recieved any response from Riot officials. Thank you

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, and see that your ticket has been escalated to a recovery specialist.  It may take a bit for a specialist to get to you, but it looks like you've been bumping your tickets.  Doing that can drop your ticket to the bottom.  Hang tight, and we'll respond asap!
